articles.description: Assam Latest News: असम के नगांव जिले में एक ग्रामीण अदालत ने सजा के तौर पर एक व्यक्ति को कथित तौर पर जिंदा जला दिया है। शख्स की पहचान रंजीत बोरदोलोई के रूप में हुई है। नगांव जिले के बोर लालुंग इलाके में हुई इस घटना का पता तब चला जब पुलिस ने बोरदोलोई को खोजने …

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Karnataka: Red alert in coastal districts till Tuesday
articles.description: Rain continued to pound the coastal districts of Dakshina Kannada and Udupi on Saturday, but with less intensity. The IMD has issued a red alert for the coastal districts till Tuesday.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Bengaluru: Conmen spent Rs 15 crore on call centre staff
articles.description: Preliminary investigation into the two fake international call centres busted by Bengaluru police in Whitefield area revealed some of the tele-callers had no idea they were part of a network that was allegedly conning American citizens.

articles.author: Times Of India
articles.title: Western Ghats order may stir up political storm in Karnataka
articles.description: The Centre’s latest move to notify the Eco-Sensitive Areas (ESA) along the Western Ghats is likely to stir up a hornet’s nest in Karnataka with elected representatives across party lines condemning the decision.

articles.author: Niranjan Kaggere
articles.title: Over 20k sqkm in K'taka’s W. Ghats eco-sensitive area
articles.description: Though it vehemently opposed the Kasturirangan committee report on Western Ghats, the Karnataka government seems to have lost its decade-long battle with the Centre.

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: Now, BMC claims concreting of roads will sort pothole mess
articles.description: As the civic body has been drawing flak for numerous potholes on Mumbai’s roads, civic officials have said that cement concreting of most roads in future will help in solving pothole problems in the city.
articles.content: TimesviewThe BMC started cement concreting roads back in 1989. These roads are generally built to last for over a decade. However, it is evident that despite cement concreting hundreds of km of road … [+216 chars]

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: Heavy rain: Orange alert for Mumbai, Thane until Wed
articles.description: As a low-pressure area formed over Odisha and neighbourhood, the IMD has kept up with its orange alert for Mumbai, Thane till Wednesday (July 13), indicating heavy to very heavy rainfall at a few places.
